genresAdvancedInfo.name: tuvan folk
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Tuvan Folk is a traditional music genre from the Tuva region of Russia. It features throat singing, a technique in which a singer produces multiple pitches simultaneously. Tuvan folk music often incorporates traditional instruments such as the igil (a bowed string instrument) and the doshpuluur (a plucked string instrument). The genre has gained international recognition in recent years, with many Tuvan musicians performing around the world.
